article_title: Obama to Bar Gay Discrimination By Federal Contractors
article_text:
WASHINGTON—President Barack Obama plans to sign an executive order barring federal contractors from hiring or firing employees based on their sexual orientation or gender identity, senior administration officials said Monday, in a move that could energize Democratic voters in November's midterm elections.

The White House announcement is a curtain raiser to Mr. Obama's appearance Tuesday at a Democratic fundraising gala with gay-rights...
